name: Game Of Life (itch) (zlyZERO, ryantoxx)
description:
User Menu

Left mouse click – changes the state of the cell from alive to dead and viceversa

Buttons:
  • Start – start the simulation.
  • Pause – stops the simulation.
  • Clear – deletes all alive cells from the grid.
  • Random – creates a random configuration of alive cells on the grid.
  • Reflector – creates a custom configuration of alive cells on the grid.
  • Glider Gun – creates a custom configuration of alive cells on the grid.
Toggles: (Custom Rules)
  • Chaos Zone - living cells may die from underpopulation or overpopulation regardless of how many neighbours they have.
  • Birth Rule - a living cell has a chance to randomly give birth to multiple cells in its vicinity every few generations.
  • Uni Production Rule - a single cell with no other neighbours adjacent to it has a chance of 1/3 to create 2 more neighbours, since if it were to create only 1 neighbour, it would still die.
Sliders:
  • Speed – lets the user to change the speed of frames update.
  • Chaos Probability – lets the user to increase/decrease the probability of creating the ‘chaos’ in the predefined zone.
  • Birth Probability – lets the user to increase/decrease the probability of creating new cells from birth Rule
Input Field:

            User can set the amount of generations.
